meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of dubonnet before dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bartender recommended trying the dubonnet as an aperitif.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone loved the dubonnet cocktails.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet and bubbly as a glass of dubonnet.
meanings.sent5: The scent of dubonnet lingered in the air, enticing guests.

meanings.definition: To mix or serve with Dubonnet.
meanings.sent1: She likes to dubonnet her cocktails for a unique flavor.
meanings.sent2: The waiter will dubonnet your drink upon request.
meanings.sent3: He dubonnets the drinks with a flourish, impressing the guests.
meanings.sent4: The chef dubonnets the sauce with a secret ingredient.
meanings.sent5: Dubonnetting the beverages adds a special touch to the evening.

meanings.sent1: The store carries a variety of dubonnet brands.
meanings.sent2: Dubonnet is a popular choice for aperitif wine.
meanings.sent3: She gifted him a bottle of his favorite dubonnet brand.
meanings.sent4: The label on the dubonnet bottle caught her eye.
meanings.sent5: The rich flavor of the dubonnet brand stood out among the rest.
